Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Oh look. It's Yuu. Getting slowly wrapped up by that grotesque giant spider over there. What a shame.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: You never did like her did you? I think the tone of your sarcasm module tells me all I need to know.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Too energetic, not enough robot. Lets just leave her to that giant spider. Cycle of life 'n all.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Perhaps it's time for a personality service on you Glados...
